entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 p.m. ADT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:18 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
